name: china_osm_v20_commitments_industry
title: Commitment value of Chinese development projects - Industry Sector
description: Commitment value of Chinese development projects from AidData's Global Chinese Development Finance Dataset v2.0. The commitment values are associated with a subset of projects from the dataset for which precise locations were found using OpenStreetMaps, and which are related to the industry sector.

extract_types_info.sum: total commitment value (2017 USD) per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Malik, A., Parks, B., Russell, B., Lin, J., Walsh, K., Solomon, K., Zhang, S., Elston, T., and S. Goodman. (2021). Banking on the Belt and Road: Insights from a new global dataset of 13,427 Chinese development projects. Williamsburg, VA: AidData at William & Mary.
